title: Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de Ni-kai Kougeki no Okaasan wa Suki Desu ka? OVA
title_japanese: 通常攻撃が全体攻撃で二回攻撃のお母さんは好きですか？OVA
title_synonyms: Do You Like Your Mom? Her Normal Attack is Two Attacks at Full Power OVA
synopsis: Unaired 13th episode. To thank the group for all their hard work in the past, Shirase invites the party to enjoy the sunny beach. While enjoying the wonderful weather and pristine waters, an accident causes Masato to lose all his memories, including those of Mamako! (Source: Funimation)

Adaptation.name: Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de 2-kai Kougeki no Okaasan wa Suki desu ka?

Other.name: Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de Ni-kai Kougeki no Okaasan wa Suki Desu ka?

opening_themes: "Iyayo Iyayo mo Suki no Uchi (イヤヨイヤヨモスキノウチ！)" by Spira Spica (スピラ・スピカ)
ending_themes: "Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de Ni-kai Kougeki Mama (通常攻撃が全体攻撃で二回攻撃ママ)" by Mamako Oosuki (Ai Kayano)
